name: I catch you
description:
I catch you i'ts a game about investigation. You play as the detective Bronson, a cat in a world of dogs. You will have to solve the crime of a striper kitten named Cassie. To do so you will need to inspect all the evicences and ask all the questions, and specially to use you smell. Originally made made for the #NoShitSherlockJam

You can play the android version here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.catsunderpressure.ProductName
